languages.text: {n}Словно удовольствовавшись вашим отступлением, сущность на экране чуть смеживает "глаза"-искры, но вас все равно не оставляет ощущение, будто бы она исподволь наблюдает за вами.{/n}
{n}As if satisfied by your retreat, the entity on the screen closes its spark-like eyes, but you can't rid yourself of the feeling that it is still watching you surreptitiously.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Словно удовольствовавшись вашим отступлением, сущность на экране чуть смеживает "глаза"-искры, но вас все равно не оставляет ощущение, будто бы она исподволь наблюдает за вами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}As if satisfied by your retreat, the entity on the screen closes it's spark-like "eyes", but you can't rid of the feeling it is still watching you subtly.{/n}
{n}As if satisfied by your retreat, the entity on the screen closes it's spark-like "eyes", but you can't rid of the feeling it is still watching you subtly.{/n}
{n}As if satisfied by your retreat, the entity on the screen closes its spark-like eyes, but you can't rid yourself of the feeling that it is still watching you surreptitiously.{/n}
{n}As if satisfied by your retreat, the entity on the screen closes its spark-like eyes, but you can't rid yourself of the feeling that it is still watching you surreptitiously.{/n}
{n}As if satisfied by your retreat, the entity on the screen closes its spark-like eyes, but you can't rid yourself of the feeling that it is still watching you surreptitiously.{/n}

languages.text: {n}屏幕上的实体闭上了它如同火花一般的眼睛，似乎对你的撤退感到很满意，但你依然感觉它仍然在偷偷地窥视着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As if satisfied by your retreat, the entity on the screen closes its spark-like eyes, but you can't rid yourself of the feeling that it is still watching you surreptitiously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}屏幕上的实体闭上了它如同火花一般的眼睛，似乎对你的撤退感到很满意，但你依然感觉它仍然在偷偷地窥视着你。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Como si quedara satisfecho por tu retirada, el ser de la pantalla cierra sus ojos, similares a las chispas. Pese a ello, sigues teniendo la impresión de que te observa atentamente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As if satisfied by your retreat, the entity on the screen closes its spark-like eyes, but you can't rid yourself of the feeling that it is still watching you surreptitiously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Como si quedara satisfecho por tu retirada, el ser de la pantalla cierra sus ojos, similares a las chispas. Pese a ello, sigues teniendo la impresión de que te observa atentamente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}こちらが去ったことに満足したかのように、画面の何かは目の代わりに火花のようなものを閉じる。だけど、ソレがまだ密かにこちらを監視しているのではないかという感覚が拭えない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As if satisfied by your retreat, the entity on the screen closes its spark-like eyes, but you can't rid yourself of the feeling that it is still watching you surreptitiously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}こちらが去ったことに満足したかのように、画面の何かは目の代わりに火花のようなものを閉じる。だけど、ソレがまだ密かにこちらを監視しているのではないかという感覚が拭えない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Wesenheit auf dem Bildschirm schließt wie von deinem Rückzug befriedigt ihre Funkenaugen, aber du wirst das Gefühl nicht los, dass sie dich nach wie vor unverwandt beobachtet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As if satisfied by your retreat, the entity on the screen closes its spark-like eyes, but you can't rid yourself of the feeling that it is still watching you surreptitiously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Wesenheit auf dem Bildschirm schließt wie von deinem Rückzug befriedigt ihre Funkenaugen, aber du wirst das Gefühl nicht los, dass sie dich nach wie vor unverwandt beobachtet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Comme soulagée par votre retraite, l'entité qui habite l'écran ferme ses yeux étincelants, mais vous ne pouvez vous débarrasser de l'impression tenace qu'elle continue à vous observer attentivement.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As if satisfied by your retreat, the entity on the screen closes its spark-like eyes, but you can't rid yourself of the feeling that it is still watching you surreptitiously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Comme soulagée par votre retraite, l'entité qui habite l'écran ferme ses yeux étincelants, mais vous ne pouvez vous débarrasser de l'impression tenace qu'elle continue à vous observer attentivement.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ekrandaki varlık, parlayan gözlerini kapatıyor. Sanki geri çekilmenden duyduğu tatmini böyle belli ediyor. Yine de çaktırmadan seni izlemeye devam ettiği hissini üzerinden atamıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As if satisfied by your retreat, the entity on the screen closes its spark-like eyes, but you can't rid yourself of the feeling that it is still watching you surreptitiously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ekrandaki varlık, geri çekilmenden tatmin olduğunu belli edercesine parlayan gözlerini kapatıyor. Yine de çaktırmadan seni izlemeye devam ettiği hissini üzerinden atamıyorsun.{/n}
